goal.en: This course allows students to learn fundamental concepts and approaches in linear circuit analysis using a well-developed methodology, covering Kirchhoff’s laws, Thevenin/Norton networks, Node/Mesh analysis, and phasors for AC circuit analysis. The home work is assigned per each chapter. The performance of the student is evaluated by exams along with the assigned home work sets.
goal.ch: 教導學生電路學所發展出的方法與概念，培養學生基本線性電路分析之能力，並能用於解決工程上電路相關的問題，並具備修習高階電路相關課程的背景能力。
